siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, We started recording to try to get ahead before Stan’s upcoming travels. Turns out the episode we recorded for next week was very time sensitive as we talk about Post-Season baseball. Listen in to our take on this years October baseball. We also discuss the…
